name: Block Maker's Toolkit
description:
----------------------------------------
READ BEFORE PLAYING: A BUG MAKES THE NAME FIELD IN THE BEGINNING UNCLICKABLE!
TO ENTER A NAME PRESS ONE OF THE COLOR BOXES AND THEN UP-ARROW ON YOUR KEYBOARD UNTIL THE NAME FIELD IS SELECTED. THEN YOU CAN ENTER A NAME AND CARRY ON!
SORRY FOR THE INCONVENIENCE! ----------------------------------------

Here comes the game description:
Block Maker's Toolkit is a maker-esque game, where instead of building levels and sharing them with the community, each player that beat a community level can submit their own edits to it, taking ownership of the level.

All levels are collaborations to make the most epic levels ever! (we hope)
